Type.Name: FileChooserAction

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FileChooserAction extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Describes whether a is being used to open existing files or to save to a possibly new file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.FileChooserAction CreateFolder = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Indicates a mode for creating a new folder. The file chooser will let the user name an existing or new folder.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.FileChooserAction Open = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates open mode. The file chooser will only let the user pick an existing file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.FileChooserAction Save = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates save mode. The file chooser will let the user pick an existing file, or type in a new filename.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.FileChooserAction SelectFolder = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates an Open mode for selecting folders. The file chooser will let the user pick an existing folder.
